ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Because they re not mentioned in the game at all. Looks like I m gonna be spending time in Steamfont tonight!
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Sep 19, 2000 at 08:05:20AM -0700, Gazamel Prime wrote:
>
> So out of curiosity, if these recipes always existed,
> I wonder why no one ever posted to the tinkering site
> about them, or to this list, before now.
>
> The main complaint from tinkers was that it was too
> expensive past skill 102, and that no one would buy
> our items. Well, people still won't buy what we make,
> but with these new items, at least we can raise up
> skill at a more reasonable rate.
>
Because they're not mentioned in the game at all.

Looks like I'm gonna be spending time in Steamfont tonight!
